preparations.content: Place potatoes in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to simmering basket.
Place carrots and veal in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to Varoma dish, leaving some of the steaming holes free for steam to circulate.
Place water and butter in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket. Place Varoma dish in position and weigh peas in, cover Varoma and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Stir mixture in Varoma with spatula to make it cook evenly, cover Varoma and cook again <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Set Varoma and simmering basket aside, empty mixing bowl reserving steaming liquid.
Place potatoes, peas from Varoma, 80 g steaming liquid, fruit juice and oil in mixing bowl then blend <b>45 sec/speed 10<b>.
Stir the purée <b>15 min/speed 3<b> without measuring cup to cool it, then serve or freeze in individual portions.
